summary.what: Release readiness for v0.1.0: LICENSE, README rewrite, prompt→draft rename propagation, org owner fixes, CI workflow, CHANGELOG, CONTRIBUTING
summary.why: Accumulated drift from prompt→draft rename and missing OSS artifacts blocked a clean first release. Needed consistent naming, proper licensing, and CI before tagging v0.1.0
summary.how: Added MIT LICENSE, rewrote README for OSS audience with badges and dogfood caveat, mass-renamed timbers prompt→draft across 8 files (docs, justfile, CI), fixed rbergman→gorewood in goreleaser/install.sh, added CI workflow for test+lint, wrote CHANGELOG in Keep a Changelog format, added CONTRIBUTING.md
